CustomField.description: User's FaceTime login ID. Used to make FaceTime calls in ServiceMax iPad Client. If this is left blank, user's phone number and email are used for the call.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter this user's FaceTime login ID if available. This is used to make FaceTime calls in ServiceMax iPad Client. If this is left blank, user's phone number and email are used for the call.
CustomField.label: FaceTime ID
